data.name: AIAnalysisBookIntro
data.value: Based on your description for storing book information, I suggest the following structure:

data.name: AIAnalysisGeneric
data.value: AI analysis complete. Suggested fields will be shown here based on your prompt. Please provide more details for a specific suggestion.

data.name: AIRefineInstruction
data.value: We can refine the types (e.g., specify URL validation for CoverImageUrl) and required fields in the next step.

data.name: AIResultInstruction
data.value: Review the suggestion below. You'll be able to refine it in the next step.

data.name: AnalysisError
data.value: An error occurred while analyzing the prompt. Please try again.

data.name: DataNeedsInstruction
data.value: Provide a detailed description of the information you want to structure. The more detail, the better the AI suggestion.

data.name: FieldTypeReference
data.comment: Use {0} as placeholder for schema name

data.name: MissingInputError
data.value: Please provide both a Schema Name and a description of your data needs.

data.name: PageDescription
data.value: Describe the data structure you need, and let AI help you define the schema.

data.name: ProceedError
data.value: Cannot proceed without a suggested schema. Please analyze the prompt first.

data.name: SchemaDescPlaceholder
data.value: Briefly describe the purpose of this schema

data.name: UserPromptPlaceholder
data.value: Example: I need to store information about books, including title, author (which should link to an Author schema), publication year, ISBN, a short summary, and cover image URL.
